name: ♥  OCEANS OF KINDNESS PHILIPPINES ECO-CHARITY BRACELETS - 100% PROCEEDS DONATED TO CHARITY
description: Hi I am Tatyana, a 10 year old member of SHINING STARS.   Me and my friends created and made these bracelets to help the animals and people affected in the Philippines typhoon.  100% of the proceeds we receive for the purchase of our bracelets will be donated to charity.  Our blue and aqua kindness bracelets with little stars are made from recycled sterling silver and recycled eco-friendly cord.  Our rubber band jelly bracelet also has a recycled sterling silver kindness charm.  All our bracelets are adjustable to fit your wrist comfortably.  Free Shipping.  100% proceeds are donated to charity.

options.name: BLUE/GREEN/YELLOW KINDNESS JELLY RUBBER BAND BRACELET

name: ♥  SHINING  STARS  WISH  GUARDIAN  LOGO  NECKLACE
description:
Wear this cool SHINING STARS Wish Guardian Logo Necklace and show your support for Helping Make Wishes and Dreams Come True for Those in Need.  Inside each necklace locket is a special star which holds a personal wish of someone (person or animal) in need.  Necklace displays our signature SHINING STARS logo.  Comes on an adjustable cord, made from recycled soda pop bottles.  Free Shipping.

INSTRUCTIONS - Dear Shining Star, Please wear this SHINING STARS Wish Guardian necklace everyday until you complete and deliver the wish to your wish recipient/person or animal in need.  When you wear this special necklace, you are the Shining Star the recipient wishes upon to help make their wish and dream come true.  Also by you wearing this necklace everyday, you act as your recipient's wish guardian, protecting their wish until you fulfil their wish and make their wish and dream come true.

Share your experience on our SHINING STARS Facebook Page  http://www.facebook.com/shining.stars.56679   And you will help inspire global kindness, friendship, unity and love throughout the world.
